document.masterDocTitle: New Records of ground beetles for Colombia (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New Records of ground beetles for Colombia (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Comments. Neotropical genus with four species, known from Costa Rica , Panamá , Brazil and French Guiana . First record for Colombia .
